description.value:
The shaman can touch a willing creature as a standard action to remove one of the following conditions: fatigued, shaken, or sickened.

At 8th level, she adds confused and frightened to the list of conditions she can remove.

At 12th level, she also adds dazed, nauseated, and panicked.

The shaman can use this ability a number of times per day equal to her shaman level.
